CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Zhihu Inc is a Q&A-inspired online content community in China that primarily offers user-generated content and professionally generated content. It generates revenues from Advertising services, Paid membership services, Content-commerce solutions, and Others. It derives all its revenues within China.
